main.name: Janak Verma
main.description: I'm a DevOps Engineer and have keen interest in Cloud infrastructure like AWS, Azure and GCP, Continious Integration and Continious Deployment (CI/CD)like Jenkins, Source Control Management like GitHub, GitLab and Bitbucket, monitoring like Prometheus with Grafana and ELK Stack and related technologies.I also write blogs and  and enjoy learning and exploring new technologies related to DevOps.
